medium: Ink, pigments, gold and silver on paper
title: Willow Bridge and Water Wheel (Uji Bridge), one of a pair
description: six-panel screen; flat gold bridge at left; stylized brown waves on water; two large weeping willow trees at left and right
creditline: The Putnam Dana McMillan Fund and gift of funds from the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation
